    parent: svn-v2:22477@0c0555d6-39d7-0310-84fc-f1cc0bd64818-branches%2fSAMBA_4_0
    committer: abartlet
    timestamp: Mon 2007-04-23 07:33:15 +0000
    message:
      Update the LDAP backend code to handle initialisation of multiple
      partitions onto the target LDAP server.
      
      Make the LDAP provision run before smbd starts, then stop the LDAP
      server.  This ensures this occurs synchronously, We then restart it
      for the 'real run' (with slapd's stdin being the FIFO).
      
      This required fixing a few things in the provision scripts, with more
      containers being created via a add/modify pair.
      
      Andrew Bartlett
    ------------------------------------------------------------
    revno: 11140.1.848
    merged: svn-v2:22477@0c0555d6-39d7-0310-84fc-f1cc0bd64818-branches%2fSAMBA_4_0
    parent: svn-v2:22476@0c0555d6-39d7-0310-84fc-f1cc0bd64818-branches%2fSAMBA_4_0
    committer: abartlet
    timestamp: Mon 2007-04-23 07:26:08 +0000
    message:
      When an invaild base is specified to ldb_search, it should return
      LDB_ERR_NO_SUCH_OBJECT.  Handle this (found against LDAP, ldb_tdb is
      being updated).
      
      Andrew Bartlett
    ------------------------------------------------------------
    revno: 11140.1.847
    merged: svn-v2:22476@0c0555d6-39d7-0310-84fc-f1cc0bd64818-branches%2fSAMBA_4_0
    parent: svn-v2:22475@0c0555d6-39d7-0310-84fc-f1cc0bd64818-branches%2fSAMBA_4_0
    committer: abartlet
    timestamp: Mon 2007-04-23 07:25:09 +0000
    message:
      The OID match is used very oddly in AD, as it is often used for fields
      that contain attribute names and objectClasses.  Make it a case
      insensitive string for now.
      
      Andrew Bartlett
    ------------------------------------------------------------
    revno: 11140.1.846
    merged: svn-v2:22475@0c0555d6-39d7-0310-84fc-f1cc0bd64818-branches%2fSAMBA_4_0

    committer: abartlet
    timestamp: Mon 2007-04-23 07:23:45 +0000
    message:
      Rather than segfault, show the name of the malformed entry.
      
      Andrew Bartlett
    ------------------------------------------------------------
    revno: 11140.1.845
    merged: svn-v2:22474@0c0555d6-39d7-0310-84fc-f1cc0bd64818-branches%2fSAMBA_4_0

    timestamp: Mon 2007-04-23 07:22:16 +0000
    message:
      If ldb does not return sucess, then the res variable may not be valid.
      It *should* just be NULL from the initialisation above, but I've had
      this not be the case...
      
      Andrew Bartlett
    ------------------------------------------------------------

    message:
      Commit the start of the DRSUAPI pull replication service.
      
      It doesn't work completely yet because we aren't able to
      resolve DNS SRV records. And also we also need a kdc locator
      plugin...
      
      But with some hacks the pull replication works fine
      
      metze

    committer: idra
    timestamp: Mon 2007-04-23 00:36:49 +0000
    message:
      
      Convert more code to use proper LDB error codes.
      This is a 1 to 1 convertion, next step is to make this
      code report an error if the basedn is not used, hopefully
      avoiding an  explicit search on the base object in the most
      common cases.
    ------------------------------------------------------------

    timestamp: Sun 2007-04-22 23:00:22 +0000
    message:
      merge handling of broken connections from wins replication client code
      to the rpc client code
      
      we need to always ask for read events on the socket otherwise we never
      get the connection error reported.
      
      shutdown the transport when a request timeout.
      
      metze
